snippet: Fast just got faster with Nexus S. A pure Google experience, Nexus S is the first phone to run Gingerbread (Android 2.3), the fastest version of Android yet.
name: Nexus S

snippet: The first smartphone with a 1.2 GHz processor and global capabilities.
name: DROID™ 2 Global by Motorola

snippet: The next generation of DOES.
name: DROID™ Pro by Motorola

snippet: The T-Mobile myTouch 4G is a premium smartphone designed to deliver blazing fast 4G speeds so that you can video chat from practically anywhere, with or without Wi-Fi.
name: T-Mobile myTouch 4G

snippet: Are you ready for everything life throws your way?
name: Motorola DEFY™ with MOTOBLUR™

snippet: The Samsung Transform™ brings you a fun way to customize your Android powered touch screen phone to just the way you like it through your favorite themed “Sprint ID Service Pack”.
name: Samsung Transform™

snippet: The T-Mobile G2 with Google is the first smartphone built for 4G speeds on T-Mobile's new network. Get the information you need, faster than you ever thought possible.
name: T-Mobile G2

snippet: Motorola CHARM fits easily in your pocket or palm.  Includes MOTOBLUR service.
name: Motorola CHARM™ with MOTOBLUR™

snippet: With its 1 GHz processor and Android 2.2 with Adobe Flash 10, the DROID 2 offers PC-like power and speed.
name: DROID™ 2 by Motorola

snippet: The Samsung Epic™ 4G delivers a premium entertainment experience through advanced 4G speeds and its innovative 4” touch display technology, which provides rich picture brilliance.
name: Samsung Epic 4G™ a Galaxy S™ phone

snippet: The Motorola Milestone delivers a richer web, smarter messaging, and top-of-line media features, all on the thinnest QWERTY slider available.
name: Milestone™ by Motorola (CDMA)

snippet: The Samsung Captivate™ delivers a cinema quality experience like you’ve never seen before. Its innovative 4” touch display technology provides rich picture brilliance, even outdoor
name: Samsung Captivate™ a Galaxy S™ phone

snippet: Changing the game, Motorola i1 brings PTT functionality into a touch screen design.
name: Motorola i1

snippet: The Samsung Intercept™ is built to deliver a high-end Android experience, complete with full QWERTY keyboard, at a great price.
name: Samsung Intercept™

snippet: The Samsung Vibrant™ delivers a cinema quality experience like you’ve never seen before. Its innovative 4” touch display technology provides rich picture brilliance, even outdoors.
name: Samsung Vibrant™ a Galaxy S™ phone

snippet: Your hand becomes a theater with the DROID X 4.3-in. hi-res screen and HD camcorder. An 8MP camera captures crisp images. Connect to a Wi-Fi hotspot or be one.
name: DROID™ X by Motorola

snippet: The Samsung Acclaim™ delivers a rich multimedia experience.  With a full QWERTY keyboard, crisp 3.2” touch screen, and access to thousands of apps to customize your phone.
name: Samsung Acclaim™

snippet: This isn't some scaled-down, mobile version of the Internet. There's GPS-based weather, visual email, Google Maps Navigation™, Facebook, Flickr, YouTube - you name it.
name: HTC Aria

snippet: With the HTC EVO, you’ve got the power to do more than you ever thought possible with a phone.
name: HTC EVO 4G

snippet: Introducing the Dell Streak, your pocket tablet has arrived.
name: Dell Streak

snippet: The myTouch 3G Slide™ smartphone with Faves Gallery™, myModes and the Genius Button™ makes sure you don’t miss a thing.
name: myTouch 3G Slide

snippet: HTC Desire delivers intense brilliance, sharp contrast, and true colors on the expansive 3.7-inch display.
name: HTC Desire (CDMA)

snippet: Connect with your Ally.
name: LG Ally

snippet: With such attention to detail on the inside and out, the name of this phone pretty much says it all.
name: DROID™ Incredible by HTC

snippet: Watch. Listen. Play. The ultimate Android multimedia smartphone.
name: Sony Ericsson Xperia X10

snippet: The Nexus One shows what's possible on mobile devices through Android when cool apps meet a fast, bright, and connected computer that fits in your pocket.
name: Nexus One

snippet: The Samsung Behold® II brings a seamless combination of entertainment and mobility into one with easy access to premium multimedia features through a brilliant AMOLED touch screen.
name: T-Mobile Behold II™

snippet: Take customization to a whole new level. Create and switch between scenes that reflect different moments in your life.
name: DROID™ Eris by HTC

snippet: It's a pint-sized power plant. Location aware. Speech-recognizing. App-mashing and multitasking. With DROID by Motorola you'll connect at breakneck speed.
name: DROID™ by Motorola

snippet: The Samsung Moment™ has a brilliant 3.2” widescreen AMOLED display that brings out the best of web browsing and the tens of thousands of apps available for download.
name: Samsung Moment™

snippet: Everything you need for work and weekend. Make it your hero with personalization that lets you create a phone just right for you.
name: HTC Hero

snippet: Phones can often define their users. With the HTC myTouch™, it’s the other way around. Experience the first phone that’s designed around the freedom of being you.
name: HTC myTouch
